name: GROVE: Nostalgia's End - 16bit RPG
description:
DEMO NOW AVAILABLE!

GROVE is a  story rich retro RPG adventure with a lot of attitude! Life in Vapor City was always strange, but after the arrival of a mysterious record, Alex and Eddie's lives are about to change forever.

- Massive 16bit adventure across space and time.

- A humorous universe inspired by 90's games and VHS movies.

- Flashy turn based combat with skills to make your head bang!

- Lovingly curated soundtrack featuring tons of retro Synthwave, Metal, Classic JRPG music, and MORE!

- The demo includes the entire first chapter's story, and several side quests and hidden treasure and content.

The game is currently deep into development, and I welcome any and all feedback.
